title: Manifold Coordinate
description: Reusable coordinate definition for manifold entities in HyperSync.

values.description: Numeric coordinate values in the chosen system (order is system-dependent).

chart.description: Optional chart/patch identifier when the manifold is covered by multiple overlapping coordinate charts.

reference_frame.description: Optional reference frame or embedding namespace (e.g., 'prod-eu-west-1', 'simulated_cluster_A').

tolerance.description: Optional numerical tolerance (epsilon) associated with this coordinate for equality / snapping decisions.

valid_for.description: Optional temporal validity window for this coordinate assignment.
